tgt_original: trijjaḥ kāraistamāpreṣya jjaḥ jjaḥ jjaḥ ityapi svayaṃ punaḥ ||222 ||
khasūtraṃ pātayecchrīmāṃ stathaivādhaḥ prasūtrayet ||223 ||  om vajrasamayasūtraṃ mātikrama hū |
sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||  gandhāmbuvajrasanmuṣṭyā hū om āḥ evamāpaṭhan |
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |  dadyātsarvakṛtājaptaṃ śiṣyebhyo yati rādarāt ||199 ||
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca |
kuśān śayyopadhānāya bāhuḥ(huṃ)  sūtraiḥ surakṣayet ||202 ||  tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
mantraprayogamatulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam |  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ śākyasiṃhādibhirvaraiḥ ||194 ||
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||
tattvena siddha me bhagavan mahārāgo mahārata ||284 ||  atyantaśuddhasarvāgra ādimuktastathāgataḥ |

src_original: ཀུན་དུ་བཟང་པོ་ཀུན་བདག་ཉིད་༎ བྱང་ཆུབ་སེམས་དཔའ་བདག་སྒྲུབས་ཤིག་། དངོས་གྲུབ་ཆེན་པོ་ཀུན་གྱི་མཆོག་། དབང་ཕྱུག་ཆེན་པོ་ཕྱག་རྒྱའི་མཆོག་། གྲུབ་པའི་རྡོ་རྗེ་ཆེར་བསྟོད་པ་༎ རྡོ་རྗེ་སྙེམས་བདག་བདག་པོའི་བདག་། སེམས་ཅན་ཀུན་གྱི་ཡིད་ཁྱབ་པ་༎
tgt_original: samantabhadra sarvātmā bodhisattva prasiddha me ||285 ||  sarvottamamahāsiddhimāhaiśvaryāgramudrayā |  siddhavajra mahotkarṣād vajragarvāpate mama ||286 ||
sarvasattvapitā caiva kāmo'gryaḥ samayāgriṇām ||287 ||  yena satyena sajjñānaṃ prajñopāyātmamaṇḍalam |
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
pure śiṣyapraveśārthaṃ tattvaṃ satyaṃ ca śrāvayet ||281 ||
mahāvajramayaḥ sattvo mañjuvajrādya siddha me ||282 ||  sarvavajradharo rājā siddha me paramākṣara ||283 ||
yadyad bhāti svasarvasvaṃ mukhyaṃ tanmañjurāṭ svayam |
dharmāḥ śuddhāḥ prakṛtyā yad buddhajñānacayaḥ sa hi ||309 ||
sarve sarvādhipatyā tu vajrānto he niyojitāḥ ||310 ||
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryaṃ vajrapāṇi dṛḍhavratam ||313 ||
om sarvatathāgatasiddhivajrasamaye tiṣṭha eṣa tvāṃ dhārayāmi hīḥ hi hi hi hi hū |  sarvānvajravrataṃ dattvā vajraṃ tattvena grāhayet |
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |
